Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Addison/Central Avenue
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via Addison, Central, Irving Park, Austin and Addison due to police activity at Addison/Central Avenue.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Central, Irving Park, Austin, then resume their normal route on Addison due to police activity at Addison/Central Avenue.

Allow extra travel time.
